question: In any organization, profits depends mainly upon?
Given selling price is Rs 10 per unit, variable cost is Rs 6 per unit and fixed cost is Rs 5,000. What is the break-even point?
The breakeven point is obtained at intersection of ?

answers.a: Total revenue and Total cost line
answers.b: Total cost and variable cost line
answers.c: Variable cost and fixed cost line
answers.d: Fixed cost and total cost line

question: Given Break even sales is 40,000 Profit earned is Rs 2,000 and fixed cost is Rs 8,000. Determine actual sales.
The Break-even Point of a company is that level of sales income which will equal the sum of its fixed cost.
While measuring break-even analysis, it is considered that during a specific period there will be no change in general price level, i.e., labor, cost of material and other overheads.
